title: THE WIKI IS LIVE!
body:
Holiday season arrived early! Behold Into The Grid's Fandom Wiki!

Here you'll find details on every card, every Driver and many other game elements.

You'll surely notice that some elements are not present. Keep in mind the Wiki is brand new, that we (hopefully as a community) will expand it and improvement as we keep playing and falling in love with this game of ours.

Feel free to check it out and theorycraft new insane builds that would score a victory on Expert difficulty!

- The Flatline Team
